title: Malaysia election: ethnic Chinese voters long for return of multiracial politics under Pakatan Harapan
description: Malaysian-Chinese have long felt dissatisfaction with pervasive racial policies and politics that place a premium on the interests of the Malay majority over all other citizens. A new survey shows they now want Pakatan Harapan back in power, and Anwar Ibrahim to be PM.
dc:creator: Hadi Azmi
author: Hadi Azmi
